layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#CCCCCC]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 181x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 179x28
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 179x24
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 64x24 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 60x19
                text run at (2,2) width 60: "appName"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (68,2) size 109x24 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 105x19
                text run at (2,2) width 62: "Netscape "
                text run at (64,2) width 43: "rules!!!"
